feed.title: DeepInfer- Deep Learning Deployment Toolkit for Medical Imagino0p-9u7ytrew34563424g
feed.subtitle: DeepInfer is an open-source toolkit for medical image analysis and processing with deep learning models. DeepInfer seamlessly integrates deep learning technology into the existing medical image analysis platforms such as 3D Slicer. It allows clinical researchers and biomedical engineers to deploy multi-platform pre-trained deep learning models and use task-specific deep models, without the need for further software development and configuration.

entry.title: Prostate Volumetirc Measurements in MRI with DeepInfer and 3D Slicer
